name: React Component Patterns
title: React Component Patterns
description: Comprehensive patterns for building reusable, composable React components including compound components, render props, higher-order components, custom hooks, composition patterns, controlled/uncontrolled components, context patterns, error boundaries, and suspense patterns

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: TypeScript and testable patterns enable verification
axiomAlignment.A2_user_primacy: Accessible, composable components serve user needs
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: Explicit composition and provider patterns clarify behavior
axiomAlignment.A4_non_harm: Error boundaries and validation prevent harmful outcomes
axiomAlignment.A5_consistency: Unified patterns across compound, headless, and slot patterns
